title: What was the piece of navigational technology that the first explorers did not have at their disposal? - Quora

response.answer_text: the technology necessary to detrmine longitude .. this is more than just an accurate chronometer - you also need a way to determine sun/star height accuratly (sextant / octant) and the astronomical infrastructure back home necessary to produce proper and accurate nautical almanachs (tables giving star, sun and planet positions accurately for the newx few years - this is the work that was done at Greenwich observators, for example)
